profile:
At Land Escapes Durham, creativity, craftsmanship and customer satisfaction are the tenets of our business. We strive to set ourselves apart by creating beautiful outdoor living spaces that are built better, and last longer. When you choose Land Escapes Durham, your project will be completed start to finish by  landscape professionals with over 30 years experience in the Durham Region, not summer students or hired help. Whether you need to spruce up the front yard for added curb appeal, or to create a backyard escape for entertaining or relaxing, we would love to work with you on any of the following projects :

Interlocking walkways, driveways, patios
Retaining walls, armour stone walls
Natural stone/flagstone
Gardens/planting
Grading/sodding/drainage
Waterfalls/water features
Indoor and outdoor stone masonry
Decks
Outdoor living features (kitchens, fireplaces etc..)
services:
Build Custom Arbor, Pergola, or Trellis
Landscape Architect
Brick and Stone Flatwork Repair
Brick and Stone Stairs, Walks and Patios
Landscape Designs
Major Grading Excavation
Landscaping for Yard or Garden
Install Synthetic Grass for Putting Greens, Play Areas, etc.
Minor Grading or Resloping
Install Landscape Curbing
Install Lawn Sprinkler System
Repair Lawn Sprinkler System
Build Outdoor Kitchen
Outdoor Lighting Install
Outdoor Lighting Repair
Playground Equipment
Install Sod
Build Concrete Swimming Pool
Install Vinyl or PVC Fence
Install Fountian or Waterfall
Install Pond or Water Feature
Install Wood Fence
Install Wrought Iron Fence

profile:
Under the Sun Ecological Landscaping is a full service Landscape Contractor and Design company providing design, installation and maintenance to the Greater Toronto Area, Oshawa and Peterborough.
We specialize in ecological, chemical-free, organic landscaping including: organic gardens, carpentry and stone work.
service_area: Greater Toronto Area, Riverdale, Scarborough, Annex, North York, Markham, Beaches, Pickering, Ajax, Oshawa
services:
Full service Landscape design and installation. 
Stone work:  flagstone patios, stone facing, retaining walls, water features.
Interlock:  driveways, paths, patios and more.
Carpentry:  decks, fences, screens, gates, gazebos, trellises, steps and more.
Gardens:  Vegetable gardens, edible landscaping, low maintenance gardens, native gardens, butterfly gardens, rain gardens and more.
Irrigation:  automatic irrigation systems, drip, spray and low flow irrigation.
Organic Landscaping Toronto, Oshawa and Peterborough
specialities:
Ecological landscaping.  Chemical-free gardens.

Stone work, Carpentry and Organic Gardens

profile:
Dynamic Brick and Stone
We are a company that builds and repairs stone and brick. 
Our goal as a company is achieving total customer satisfaction. Our passion is designing and building quality, one of a kind, stone and brick features for your home.

We build and design
Fireplaces, walkways, patios, back splashes, outdoor and indoor walls, dry-lay stone walls and artistic centerpieces.
And so much more! 

Replace and repair services include:

Replace all damaged brick and stone, 
Repair all cracked or damaged joints,
Replace broken or damaged flagstone,
Sealing or re-sealing flagstone,
Power washing dirt and grime off all patios, walkways and homes.

profile:
Birk’s Landscaping is a design/build landscaping company that has been doing business in the Durham Region since 1991.  We are involved in all stages of the landscaping process from the very first idea until the last brick has been put in place and beyond.  Half of our clientele are referrals from our satisfied customers. Birk’s specializes in: 	Pool landscaping, Patios, Walkways, Driveways, Front Entrances, Pergolas and Decks.
 
To see if Birk’s is a perfect fit for your landscaping dreams give us a call at 905-404-0602 or for more information feel free to visit our website www.birkslandscaping.net
memberships: Landscape Ontario and Canadian Nursery Landscape Association
warranty_terms: 2 year warranty for stone work 1 year for plants

profile:
Filedmasters Synthetic Grass is second to none in the synthetic turf industry. Since 1991 we have provided the Canadian market with high-quality artificial turf products that are ideal for putting or golf greens, playgrounds, landscaping and more. 

Due to increasing water shortages and environmental concerns regarding chemicals and lawn fertilizers, more homeowners, business owners, and city governments are opting to install our products. Our synthetic grass eliminates the need for constant maintenance such as irrigation, mowing, fertilizing, aerating and more.

Fieldmasters products are durable, versatile, safe, economical and 100% recyclable. Most importantly, they look and feel so much like real natural sod that they enhance the look of any residential or commercial landscape. We are proud to offer our clients a high-quality product that will stand the test of time.

We also offer ull landscape and design for residential, recreational and commercial properties.

Residential: Grass replacement (back yard, front yard, balconies, roof tops), pool deck covering, interlocking patios, retaining walls, fencing, path ways and flag stones. 

Recreational: Sports fields such as soccer, football, lacrosse and lawn bowling.

Commercial: Day cares, community centers,  dog kennels, dog spas, gold centers, fitness centers.

....and many more!

- We are proudly Canadian
- We are located in GTA, in turn can provide quick response as required
- Proven success various of installation (installers are certified)
- Our product is North American made from one of the largest artificial turf manufacturer in the world. They are leaders in manufacturing artificial turf for various uses, industries and geographic locations
- We’ve been in business for 25+ years.
- Our turf is technologically advanced synthetic turf system that is engineered for durability, performance, and appearance
- Our backing is a premium design/quality, resulting in better drainage, better suited for pet management and weed prevention
- Our product is 100% made from new materials, no part of the turf is recycled or has been used previously
- Our product is 100% recyclable, heaven forbid you wanted to remove it
- Our product is 100% lead free and fire tested (have certifications to prove it)
- Our product doesn’t attract insects, animals won’t eat it, weed will not grow through it,  it’s allergen-free, and accidents wash right through
- Our product is designed to deter against various elements: high human and non-human traffic, heavy rain, heavy snow, high winds, high sun
- 10 year limited warranty
- Fully insured and WSIB
- Many references (see the pictures for a small sample of what we have accomplished)
name: Fieldmasters Synthetic Grass & Landscape Design

profile:
Our name says it all, we are Small Jobs Landscaping and we provide our customers with creative design and quality workmanship for those "smaller" landscaping projects.

We provide service in Durham Region, including Newcastle, Clarington, Oshawa, Whitby, Ajax and Pickering, as well as Port Hope and Cobourg. Don't worry if you think your project is too BIG or too small for us, give Small Jobs Landscaping a call at 905-244-8551 or Request a Quote through our online form. We will come to your house, discuss your ideas, put together a detailed plan, provide quotes and solutions to your landscaping needs. Of course at Small Job Landscaping, we do this for FREE! 

We often get asked what is a "small job"? Well if you are looking to spend a hundred thousand dollars or so, that's not us (at least not yet), but if your budget is in the range of $1,500.00 - $20,000 that is where we thrive. If your project is slightly outside of that range, you can still contact us and we can see what we can do.
name: Small Jobs Landscaping
